name: Cyworld
description: We sincerely believe that Cyworld, a home of your memories belongs not just to the company but to all of us. You can keep your precious memories in the forms of image, video, etc. Keep your past and present memories on Cyworld.   1. Timeline which reflects your interests - Timeline is the first page you encounter. You can check your friends postings and videos in one scroll. Click the following friend recommendation and group tabs to see their updates on your timeline!   2. Cyhome, a home for your precious memories  - We kept all your memories intact at Cyhome from photos and diaries to texts, BGMs and videos. Today History service takes you back to the good old times.   3. Original Mini Me - You can now enjoy Mini Me on mobile platforms. Express many different emotions including joy, sad, love and happy via your Mini Me. We have even added Avatar with Voice function!   4. BGM to express your mood - You may have forgotten your old music playlists but Cyworld hasnt! Enjoy the music you once loved on Cyworld.   5. Find Friend with detailed search function - Look for your friends such as their date of birth and gender. We also recommend friends for you.   6. Improved video function - Record videos either short or long. upload it onto Cyworld right away. It will enrich your memories.   *CYWORLD WEB: http://www.cyworld.com/
